definition: to encrypt/encryption/to protect with a password
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
surname Mi/name of an ancient state

pinyin: jia1 mi4 tao4 jie1 zi4 xie2 yi4 ceng2

sentences.english: Sends the encrypted session key to the server.
sentences.chinese: 將加密的會話密鑰發送給服務器。

sentences.english: This is a sentence or string phrase that has been encrypted.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個被加密的句子或字符串短語。

sentences.english: We can also refer to external encrypted data or encrypted keys.
sentences.chinese: 我們也可以引用外部加密數據或加密密鑰。

sentences.english: We can also refer to external encrypted data or encrypted keys.
sentences.chinese: 我們也可以引用外部加密數據或加密密鑰。

sentences.english: In addition, it encrypts all the calls to ensure that no one can listen to your saved conversations.
sentences.chinese: 而且別人無法聽到這些經過加密的通話錄音。

sentences.english: No one knows what regulations apply to crypto-equity yet.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人知道什麼樣的法規能適用於加密股權。

sentences.english: Encryption is provided by a strong RC4 algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 加密過程是使用了RC4的加密算法。

sentences.english: Encryption is provided by a strong RC4 algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 加密過程是使用了RC4的加密算法。
登錄信息有時並沒有經過加密。

sentences.english: And encipher his nature into mine.
You type at the keyboard words that you want to encrypt.
sentences.chinese: 你從鍵盤上鍵入你想加密的單詞。

sentences.english: Packet encryption also allows packets to be time-stamped.
sentences.chinese: 包加密也允許包被加上時間標記。

sentences.english: Modular exponentiation algorithm is widely used in public key encryption technology.
sentences.chinese: 模冪算法廣泛應用於公開密鑰加密技術。

sentences.english: In this paper, a data encryption and decryption system-DEADS is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一個數據加密和解密體制DEADS。

sentences.english: Public-key systems have several advantages over secret-key systems.
sentences.chinese: 鑰系統對數據進行加密。

sentences.english: An encrypted message cannot be decrypted by the destination queue manager.
sentences.chinese: 加密的消息不能由目標隊列管理器解密。

definition: token (used instead of money for slot machines, in game arcades etc)
